title.narrative: Access to Finance for the Poor Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Access to Finance for the Poor Programme) is a component of Access to Finance Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £25,663,996. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Financial policy and administrative management, Monetary institutions, Formal sector financial intermediaries, Informal/semi-formal financial intermediaries, Education/training in banking and financial services, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development. , with the following implementing partners: Louis Berger Group. The start date is 01-02-2013 and the end date is 31-08-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Education/training in banking and financial services
